Package jetbrains.mps.smodel.language

Interface LanguageExtensions

  • public interface LanguageExtensions
    Language runtime needs to know what modules contribute extensions to aspects of the language. MPS used to rely on 'extends' relation between language modules to find out possible contributors, which is not perfect - misguiding ('extending' language is not necessarily the same as 'contributing' language) and way too coarse (e.g. editor contributions are not necessarily relate to extends between concepts). Besides, given the fact all MPS languages extend j.m.lang.core, aspects of any language are treated as 'contributing' extensions to concepts of j.m.lang.core (e.g. INamedConcept). Implementation of this interface is supplied to a LanguageRuntime by MPS runtime code; it's not expected to be implemented by clients. Perhaps, "ModuleRuntimeExtensions" would be better name
    Since:
    2020.1

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void recordContribution​(String targetLanguageName, String targetLanguageId, Class<? extends ILanguageAspect> aspectClass)
      Same as recordContribution(SLanguage, Class), handy for use from generated code
      void recordContribution​(SLanguage targetLanguage, Class<? extends ILanguageAspect> aspectClass)
      Generated code of a language runtime uses this method to manifect it provides contributions to a further unspecified extension point of the selected aspect of a language.

    • Method Detail

      • recordContribution

        void recordContribution​(SLanguage targetLanguage,
                        Class<? extends ILanguageAspect> aspectClass)
        Generated code of a language runtime uses this method to manifect it provides contributions to a further unspecified extension point of the selected aspect of a language. When needed, aspect implementation code could query contributions recorded for it, using LanguageRuntime.forEachContributor(Class, Consumer).
        Parameters:
        targetLanguage - identifies a language to receive contributions
        aspectClass - identifies an aspect of the target language.

      • recordContribution

        void recordContribution​(String targetLanguageName,
                        String targetLanguageId,
                        Class<? extends ILanguageAspect> aspectClass)
        Same as recordContribution(SLanguage, Class), handy for use from generated code
